metadata.description: Name of the the environment which is used to generate a short unique hash used in all resources.
Primary location for all resources
Id of the user or app to assign application roles

metadata.name: User Assigned Identity
metadata.description: This module deploys a User Assigned Identity, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the User Assigned Identity.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
The resource ID of the deployed user assigned identity.
The name of the deployed user assigned identity.
The resource group of the deployed user assigned identity.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The principal ID (object ID) of the user assigned identity.
The client ID (application ID) of the user assigned identity.
User assigned identity name

metadata.name: Storage Account
metadata.description: This module deploys a Storage Account, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the Storage Account. Must be between 3-24 characters and use numbers and lower-case letters only.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The SKU name of the Storage Account.
Optional. Indicates the type of storage account.
Optional. Allows https traffic only to storage service if set to true.
Optional. Set the minimum TLS version to be permitted on requests to storage.
Optional. Allow or disallow public access to all blobs or containers in the storage account.
Optional. Indicates whether the storage account permits requests to be authorized with the account access key via Shared Key.
Optional. Whether or not public network access is allowed for this resource.
Optional. Networks ACLs, this value contains IPs to whitelist and/or Subnet information.
Optional. Blob service and containers to deploy.
The resource ID of the deployed storage account.
The name of the deployed storage account.
The resource group of the deployed storage account.
The primary endpoints of the deployed storage account.
The location the resource was deployed into.

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('appServicePlanName'))), createObject('value', parameters('appServicePlanName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').webServerFarms, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.name: App Service Plan
metadata.description: This module deploys an App Service Plan (Web Server Farm), based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the App Service Plan.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The SKU for the App Service Plan.
Optional. The kind of the App Service Plan.
Optional. Target worker count for the App Service Plan.
Optional. Target worker size for the App Service Plan.
Optional. If true, apps assigned to this App Service plan can be scaled independently.
Optional. Maximum number of workers for the App Service Plan.
Optional. If Linux app service plan.
The resource ID of the deployed app service plan.
The name of the deployed app service plan.
The resource group of the deployed app service plan.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The kind of the deployed app service plan.

parameters.name: [if(not(empty(parameters('serviceBusNamespaceName'))), createObject('value', parameters('serviceBusNamespaceName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').serviceBusNamespaces, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.name: Service Bus Namespace
metadata.description: This module deploys a Service Bus Namespace, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the Service Bus namespace.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The SKU of the Service Bus namespace.
Optional. Whether or not this resource is zone redundant.
Optional. Whether or not public network access is allowed for this resource.
Optional. The queues to create in the service bus namespace.
The resource ID of the deployed service bus namespace.
The name of the deployed service bus namespace.
The resource group of the deployed service bus namespace.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The FQDN of the deployed service bus namespace.
The service bus namespace ID.
The service bus namespace name.
The service bus namespace FQDN.
The first queue name (for backward compatibility).

metadata.name: Virtual Network
metadata.description: This module deploys a Virtual Network with subnets, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. The name of the Virtual Network (vNet).
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. An Array of 1 or more IP Address Prefixes for the Virtual Network.
Optional. An Array of subnets to deploy to the Virtual Network.
Optional. Indicates if DDoS protection is enabled for all the protected resources in the virtual network.
Optional. The DDoS protection plan associated with the virtual network.
Optional. DNS Servers associated to the Virtual Network.

Optional. Resource ID of the DDoS protection plan to assign the VNET to. If it's left blank, DDoS protection will not be configured. If it's provided, the property 'enableDdosProtection' will be ignored.
The resource ID of the virtual network.
The name of the virtual network.
The names of the deployed subnets.
The resource IDs of the deployed subnets.
The address space of the virtual network.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The resource group of the virtual network.
Service Bus subnet name (compatibility output).
Service Bus subnet ID (compatibility output).
App subnet name (compatibility output).
App subnet ID (compatibility output).
Storage subnet name (compatibility output).
Storage subnet ID (compatibility output).
Specifies the name of the virtual network.
Specifies the name of the subnet for the Service Bus private endpoint.
Specifies the resource id of the Service Bus namespace.
Specifies the location.
Specifies the name of the virtual network.
Specifies the name of the subnet which contains the virtual machine.
Specifies the resource name of the Storage resource with an endpoint.
Specifies the location.

parameters.applicationInsightsName: [if(not(empty(parameters('applicationInsightsName'))), createObject('value', parameters('applicationInsightsName')), createObject('value', format('{0}{1}', variables('abbrs').insightsComponents, variables('resourceToken'))))]

metadata.name: Monitoring Solution
metadata.description: This module deploys a complete monitoring solution with Log Analytics Workspace and Application Insights, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the Log Analytics workspace.
Required. Name of the Application Insights.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The workspace data retention in days.
Optional. Application type.

metadata.name: Log Analytics Workspace
metadata.description: This module deploys a Log Analytics Workspace, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the Log Analytics workspace.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Optional. The workspace data retention in days.
Optional. The workspace daily quota for ingestion.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Log Analytics ingestion.
Optional. The network access type for accessing Log Analytics query.
The resource ID of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The name of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The resource group of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The workspace ID of the deployed log analytics workspace.

metadata.name: Application Insights
metadata.description: This module deploys an Application Insights instance, based on Azure Verified Modules pattern.
Required. Name of the Application Insights.
Optional. Location for all resources.
Optional. Tags of the resource.
Required. The resource ID of the Log Analytics workspace that backs this Application Insights instance.
Optional. Application type.
Optional. The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI.
Optional. Disable IP masking.
Optional. Disable local authentication.
Optional. Used by the Application Insights SDKs to determine what endpoint to send telemetry to.
Optional. Percentage of the data produced by the application being monitored that is being sampled for Application Insights telemetry.
The resource ID of the deployed application insights instance.
The name of the deployed application insights instance.
The resource group of the deployed application insights instance.
The location the resource was deployed into.
The connection string of the deployed application insights instance.
The instrumentation key of the deployed application insights instance.
The resource ID of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The name of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The workspace ID of the deployed log analytics workspace.
The resource ID of the deployed application insights instance.
The name of the deployed application insights instance.
The connection string of the deployed application insights instance.
The instrumentation key of the deployed application insights instance.
